title: In your opinion, what is the most interesting question and what is your answer to this question? - Quora

response.answer_text: if jesus wants me for a sunbeam , what sun is it he wants me for ?is it for our sun ? or 1 of the far away ones like beetleguese ?considering the mount of stars in our galaxy alone , i guess it must be our own sun ? , if not please enlighten me .
